channel.title: Setrights Message Given, please help!

item.title: Setrights Message Given, please help!
item.dc:creator: @Inception-X Inception-X
item.description:
@Inception-X wrote:

This is my ;;setrights command:

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("setrights") && player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("chris")) { String username = cmd[1].substring(cmd[1].indexOf(" ") + 1); Player other = World.getPlayerByDisplayName(username); if (other == null) return true; other.setRights(Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You Modified There Rank!"); return true; }

And all i am asking is how to make it send a message when the player gets demoted/premoted…

example.
i type: ;;setrights name 2
player message for “name”: You have just been premoted!

i type: ;;setrights name 0
player message for “name”: You have just been demoted!

Please! help me
and thankyou!

Read full topic
